data.lyric:
[ti:One Foot]
[ar:Walk The Moon]
[al:One Foot]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Foot - WALK THE MOON
[00:00.29]Written by：Eli Maiman/Kevin Ray/Nicholas Petricca/Sean Waugaman/Ryan McMahon/Ryan Rabin/Benjamin Berger
[00:00.58]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[00:02.75]
[00:05.33]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[00:07.49]
[00:09.83]Not a soul up ahead and nothing behind
[00:12.24]There's a desert in my blood and a storm in your eyes
[00:14.51]Am I the king of nothing at all
[00:16.32]
[00:16.88]And you're the queen of nothing at all
[00:18.66]
[00:19.30]But I remember the fight and I forget the pain
[00:21.77]I got my hand in your pocket and my key in your chain
[00:24.13]Am I the king of nothing at all
[00:25.77]
[00:26.43]And you're the queen of nothing at all
[00:28.14]
[00:29.31]Oh through the wilderness
[00:33.69]You and I will walk into the emptiness
[00:38.12]
[00:38.79]Oh and my heart is a mess
[00:42.99]Is it the only defense against the wilderness
[00:47.92]Well cross my heart and hope to die
[00:50.24]Taking this one step at a time
[00:52.72]I got your back if you got mine
[00:55.01]Oh one foot in front of the other
[00:58.13]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[01:00.66]One foot in front of the other
[01:02.90]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[01:05.47]One foot in front of the other
[01:07.47]
[01:15.36]One foot in front of the other
[01:17.17]
[01:22.61]Ooh all that we have is each other
[01:25.02]One foot in front of the other
[01:26.71]
[01:31.50]Not a soul in the road not a star in the sky
[01:33.82]It's a desert in my heart and nowhere to hide
[01:36.24]I'm your king of nothing at all
[01:37.89]
[01:38.51]And you're my queen of nothing at all
[01:40.14]
[01:40.92]Well out here in the dust if you don't have trust
[01:43.27]Ain't nothing left of us this is the exodus
[01:45.75]They're just testing us they can't flex with us
[01:48.09]They can't mess with us they can't mess with us
[01:50.53]
[01:51.10]Oh through the wilderness
[01:55.17]How come even together there can be loneliness
[01:59.66]
[02:00.64]Oh our heart's a mess
[02:04.69]But it's our only defense to brave the wilderness
[02:09.63]Well cross my heart and hope to die
[02:11.88]Taking this one step at a time
[02:14.21]I got your back if you got mine
[02:16.62]Oh one foot in front of the other
[02:19.76]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[02:21.83]
[02:22.38]One foot in front of the other
[02:24.51]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[02:27.07]One foot in front of the other
[02:29.11]
[02:36.95]One foot in front of the other
[02:38.72]
[02:43.80]Ooh all that we have is each other
[02:46.53]One foot in front of the other
[02:48.30]
[02:53.06]Well out here in the dust
[02:54.26]
[02:58.29]Oh through the wilderness
[03:02.37]How come even together there can be loneliness
[03:06.93]
[03:07.69]Oh our heart's a mess
[03:11.74]But it's our only defense to brave the wilderness
[03:16.86]Cross my heart and hope to die
[03:19.02]Taking this one step at a time
[03:21.39]I got your back if you got mine
[03:23.82]Oh one foot in front of the other
[03:26.90]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[03:28.92]
[03:29.49]One foot in front of the other
[03:31.73]Ooh ooh ooh hey
[03:33.86]
[03:34.36]One foot in front of the other hey
[03:36.67]
[03:42.10]In the wilderness
[03:43.18]
[03:44.13]One foot in front of the other hey
[03:46.41]
[03:50.77]Ooh all that we have is each other
[03:53.80]One foot in front of the other
[03:55.81]
[04:00.58]Oh in the so called land of the free
[04:03.46]One foot in front of the other
[04:05.02]
[04:09.85]Don't you know that all we have is each other
[04:13.04]One foot in front of the other
data.trans:
[ti:One Foot]
[ar:Walk The Moon]
[al:One Foot]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.29]//
[00:00.58]//
[00:02.75]
[00:05.33]//
[00:07.49]
[00:09.83]没有一颗乐观向上的灵魂 身后没有一丝追寻
[00:12.24]我的血液中藏着荒原 你眼神里酝酿着风暴
[00:14.51]如果我是一无所有的国王
[00:16.32]
[00:16.88]你就是一无所有的王后
[00:18.66]
[00:19.30]但是 我还记得那场纷争 却已忘记疼痛
[00:21.77]我将手插进你的口袋中 我的钥匙就挂在你的手链上
[00:24.13]如果我是一无所有的国王
[00:25.77]
[00:26.43]你就是一无所有的王后
[00:28.14]
[00:29.31]在一望无际的荒原中
[00:33.69]我们会走向无尽的空虚
[00:38.12]
[00:38.79]我心乱如麻
[00:42.99]这是我们唯一一次与荒野对抗吗
[00:47.92]好吧 说真的 我真想一死了之
[00:50.24]一步一个脚印 慢慢来
[00:52.72]如果你背弃我 我也会这样对你
[00:55.01]我们近在咫尺
[00:58.13]//
[01:00.66]我们近在咫尺
[01:02.90]//
[01:05.47]我们近在咫尺
[01:07.47]
[01:15.36]我们近在咫尺
[01:17.17]
[01:22.61]我们现在只剩彼此了
[01:25.02]我们近在咫尺
[01:26.71]
[01:31.50]路上没有一颗勇敢的灵魂 夜空没有一颗闪亮的星星
[01:33.82]我心中的荒原已经无法隐藏一切
[01:36.24]我是你一无所有的国王
[01:37.89]
[01:38.51]你是我一无所有的王后
[01:40.14]
[01:40.92]好吧 如果你不信任我 我们的关系就会变成远处的黄昏
[01:43.27]我们的感情就会荡然无存 爱情就这样渐行渐远
[01:45.75]他们只是在考验我们 他们无法动摇我们的感情
[01:48.09]他们可以在我们之间捣乱 但是他们无法破坏我们的感情
[01:50.53]
[01:51.10]在一望无际的荒原中
[01:55.17]我们如何紧紧相依 这里可能会让人倍感孤单
[01:59.66]
[02:00.64]我们心乱如麻
[02:04.69]但是 这是我们唯一一次与荒野对抗
[02:09.63]好吧 说真的 我真想一死了之
[02:11.88]一步一个脚印 慢慢来
[02:14.21]如果你背弃我 我也会这样对你
[02:16.62]我们近在咫尺
[02:19.76]//
[02:21.83]
[02:22.38]我们近在咫尺
[02:24.51]//
[02:27.07]我们近在咫尺
[02:29.11]
[02:36.95]我们近在咫尺
[02:38.72]
[02:43.80]现在 我们只剩彼此了
[02:46.53]我们近在咫尺
[02:48.30]
[02:53.06]好吧 我们的关系就像远处的黄昏
[02:54.26]
[02:58.29]在一望无际的荒原中
[03:02.37]我们如何紧紧相依 这里可能会让人倍感孤单
[03:06.93]
[03:07.69]我们心乱如麻
[03:11.74]但是 这是我们唯一一次与荒野对抗
[03:16.86]好吧 说真的 我真想一死了之
[03:19.02]一步一个脚印 慢慢来
[03:21.39]如果你背弃我 我也会这样对你
[03:23.82]我们近在咫尺
[03:26.90]//
[03:28.92]
[03:29.49]我们近在咫尺
[03:31.73]//
[03:33.86]
[03:34.36]我们近在咫尺
[03:36.67]
[03:42.10]在一望无际的荒原中
[03:43.18]
[03:44.13]我们近在咫尺
[03:46.41]
[03:50.77]现在 我们只剩彼此了
[03:53.80]我们近在咫尺
[03:55.81]
[04:00.58]在这所谓的自由土地上
[04:03.46]我们近在咫尺
[04:05.02]
[04:09.85]你不知道吗 现在 我们只剩彼此了
[04:13.04]我们近在咫尺
